item.title: US-2 West at MTS-206 - Columbia Falls
item.description: US-2 West at MTS-206 junction in Columbia Falls. Use MTS-206 south for Bigfork; continue west on US-2 for Columbia Falls and Kalispell.

item.title: US-2 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-2 west. Distance to Coram, Columbia Falls, and Kalispell.

item.title: End Going To The Sun Road West at US-2
item.description: End Going To The Sun Road West at US-2 in West Glacier. Turn right on US-2 for Kalispell; left on US-2 for East Glacier.

item.title: Going To The Sun Road West Approaching US-2
item.description: Going To The Sun Road West approaching US-2 in West Glacier. Turn left on US-2 east for East Glacier; right on US-2 west for Kalispell and Whitefish.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East at US-95/US-2 Split
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East at US-95/US-2 split. Turn right for US-2 east to Moyie Springs and Kalispell (Montana). Continue north on US-95 for Canada.

item.title: Sand Hill Road East at US-2 and US-95 Junction
item.description: Sand Hill Road East at US-2 and US-95 Junction. Turn right for US-95 south to Bonners Ferry; left for US-95 north to Canada; straight for US-2 east to Moyie Springs.

item.title: US-2 East at US-95 and ID-200
item.description: US-2 East at US-95 and ID-200. Continue straight for ID-200 East to Clark Fork. Merge right for US-2 East/US-95 North for Bonners Ferry and Canada. US-2 east joins US-95 north to Bonners Ferry.

item.title: US-2 East at US-95 South
item.description: US-2 East at US-95 South to Spokane and Coeur d’Alene. Entering Ponderay.

item.title: US-2 East/To ID-200 East - Sandpoint
item.description: US-2 East/To ID-200 East in Sandpoint

item.title: US-2 East at ID-57 North
item.description: US-2 east at ID-57 north to Priest Lake. Continue east on US-2 for Sandpoint and Bonners Ferry.

item.title: US-2 East - Entering Oldtown Idaho
item.description: US-2 East - Entering Oldtown Idaho at the Washington-Idaho state line.

item.title: US-2 East - Newport
item.description: US-2 East in Newport. Merge right to continue east on US-2 towards Sandpoint (Idaho).

item.title: US-2 East Approaching WA-211 North
item.description: US-2 East approaching WA-211 North to Cusick and Metaline Falls.

item.title: US-2 East Approaching WA-206
item.description: US-2 East Approaching WA-206 to Mount Spokane State Park.

item.title: US-2 East Approaching Future US-395
item.description: US-2 East approaching Farwell Road to Future US-395/Colville/Francis Ave.

item.title: US-2 East/US-395 North at US-2/US-395 Split
item.description: US-2 East/US-395 North at US-2/US-395 split in Spokane. Turn right for US-2 East to Newport.

item.title: US-2 East/US-395 North Approaching US-2/US-395 Split
item.description: US-2 East/US-395 North (Division St.) approaching US-2 East to Newport.

item.title: US-2 East/US-395 North Approaching US-2/US-395 Split
item.description: US-2 East/US-395 North (Division St.) approaching US-2/US-395 Split in Spokane. Use US-2 east for Newport; US-395 north for Colville.

item.title: US-2 East/US-395 North Approaching WA-291
item.description: US-2 East/US-395 North (Division St.) approaching WA-291 North (Francis Ave.) to Suncrest and Riverside State Park.

item.title: US-2 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-2 west. Distance to Fairchild AFB, Grand Coulee Dam, and Wenatchee.

item.title: US-2 West - Highway Entrance
item.description: Highway Entrance on US-2 west at Sunset Blvd.

item.title: Sunset Blvd. at US-2
item.description: Sunset Blvd. west at US-2 west to Davenport. Use left lane to continue on Sunset Blvd. to the Spokane Airport.

item.title: Sunset Blvd. West Approaching US-2
item.description: Sunset Blvd. West approaching US-2. Use right lane for US-2 West to Davenport; left lane for the Spokane Airport.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 277A and 277B
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 277A - Garden Springs. Approaching Exit 277B - US-2 West/Spokane Airport. US-2 east follows I-90 from here into downtown Spokane.

item.title: US-97 South at US-2/US-97 Jct.
item.description: US-97 South at US-2/US-97 Jct. Continue south for US-97/To I-90/To WA-970 to Cle Elum, Ellensburg, and Seattle. Turn left for US-2 East/US-97 North onramp to Wenatchee. US-97 south leaves US-2 westbound here.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South At US-2/US-97 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South at the US-2/US-97 split. Use US-97 South to I-90/Ellensburg/Seattle (via Snoqualmie Pass). Use US-2 West to Leavenworth, Stevens Pass and Seattle (via Stevens Pass).

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-2/US-97 Split
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching US-2/US-97 Split. Use US-97 south for WA-970/I-90 to Cle Elum, Ellensburg, and Seattle. A variable speed limit sign shows the speed as 60 MPH.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South at WA-285
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South at WA-285 in Wenatchee. Merge left for (WA-285 South) to Ellensburg. Continue straight for US-2 West/US-97 South to Seattle and Ellensburg.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching WA-285
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching WA-285. Use right lane for US-2 West/US-97 South to Ellensburg and Seattle. Continue straight for WA-285 South to Wenatchee and Mission Ridge Ski Area.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching WA-285
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching WA-285 in Wenatchee. Use right lane to continue on US-2 West/US-97 South to Seattle and Ellensburg.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South at Alt. US-97 North
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South at Alt. US-97 North to Entiat and Chelan.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching US-97 Alt. North
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching US-97 Alt. North to Entiat and Chelan. Entering Chelan County and crossing the Columbia River.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South at WA-28
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South at WA-28 in Douglas County. Turn right to continue on US-2 West/US-97 South towards Ellensburg, Seattle, and Wenatchee (on the other bank of the Columbia River). Continue straight for WA-28 East to Quincy, East Wenatchee and I-90. Turn left for Eastmont Ave.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching WA-28
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching WA-28 in Douglas County.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South Approaching WA-28
item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching WA-28 in Douglas County. Use US-2 West/US-97 South for Seattle and Ellensburg.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-2 West/US-97 South. Distance to East Wenatchee and Quincy. Both of those cities are via WA-28.

item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South shields in Douglas County.

item.title: US-2 West/US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-2 West/US-97 South. Distance to Wenatchee, Cashmere, and Leavenworth.

item.title: US-2 West at US-97
item.description: US-2 West at US-97 in Orondo. Turn right for US-97 north to Chelan and Okanogan. Turn left for US-2 West/(US-97 South) to Wenatchee. US-97 south joins US-2 west to Cashmere.

item.title: US-2 West at Connection to US-97 North
item.description: US-2 West at connection to US-97 North in Orondo. Turn right for US-97 north; left for US-2 west.

item.title: US-2 West at US-97 North
item.description: US-2 West at US-97 North. Turn right for connection to US-97 North/Chelan/Okanogan. Merge left for US-2 West towards Wenatchee.

item.description: Entering Orondo on US-2 west.

item.title: US-2 West Approaching US-97
item.description: US-2 West approaching US-97 in Orondo.

item.title: US-2 West - Waterville
item.description: US-2 west (Chelan St.) at Locust St. Turn right on Locust St. to continue west on US-2 towards Wenatchee.

item.title: US-2 West - Waterville
item.description: US-2 west (Poplar Ave.) at Chelan St. in Waterville. Turn left on Chelan St. to continue west on US-2 towards Wenatchee.

item.title: US-2 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-2 west. Distance to Waterville, Wenatchee, and Seattle.

item.description: US-2 West approaching WA-172 East to Mansfield.

item.description: US-2 West in Douglas County

item.title: US-2 West/WA-17 North Approaching US-2/WA-17 Split
item.description: US-2 West/WA-17 North approaching US-2/WA-17 split in Douglas County. Use WA-17 north for Bridgeport and Chief Joseph Dam.

item.title: WA-17 North at US-2 - Dry Falls Junction
item.description: WA-17 North at US-2. Turn right for US-2 East/To WA-155/Grand Coulee Dam/Spokane. Turn left for US-2 West/WA-17 North/Wenatchee. WA-17 north joins US-2 westbound for about 2 miles.

item.title: WA-17 North Approaching US-2
item.description: WA-17 North approaching US-2 to Spokane and Wenatchee.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 279
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 279 - US-195 South/Colfax/Pullman.

item.title: I-90 West - Exits 280B and 280A
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 280B - Lincoln St. Approaching Exit 280A - Maple St./Walnut St.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 281
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 281 - US-2/Newport/US-395 North/Colville/Division St.. US-395 joins I-90 west to Ritzville. US-2 joins I-90 west through Spokane.

item.title: Freya St. South at Future US-395 North
item.description: Freya St. South at Future US-395 North. Use Future US-395 north for Colville and US-2.

item.title: Future US-395 South - Farwell Road IC
item.description: Future US-395 South at the Farwell Road/To US-2 interchange.

item.title: Future US-395 South - Farwell Road IC
item.description: Future US-395 South approaching Farwell Road/To US-2 interchange.

item.title: US-395 South at North Spokane Corridor
item.description: US-395 South at North Spokane Corridor. Use left lane to continue south on the freeway along the North Spokane Corridor. Use the right lane for the US-395 South/To I-90/Division St./Spokane interchange. The next three exits on the North Spokane Corridor (Future US-395) are US-2, Parksmith Drive, and Francis Ave.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East at US-95/US-2 Split
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East at US-95/US-2 split. Turn right for US-2 east to Moyie Springs and Kalispell (Montana). Continue north on US-95 for Canada.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East approaching US-2
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East approaching US-2. Turn right to continue east on US-2.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 North/US-2 East. Distance to Junction US-2, Moyie Springs (via US-2), and Canada (via US-95).

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East - Chinook St. Jct.
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East approaching Chinook St./Hospital. Continue on US-95 North/US-2 East for Moyie Springs (via US-2) and Canada (via US-95).

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East at Bus. US-95 Jct.
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East at Bus. US-95 Jct. to (Bonners Ferry) City Center. Continue ahead for Moyie Springs (via US-2) and Canada (via US-95). The Kootenai River bridge is in the background of the photo.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East - Bonners Ferry
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East at Ash St. in Bonners Ferry

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East - Alderson Ln
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East at Alderson Ln. Turn right for Alderson Lake and Paradise Valley.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East - Bonners Ferry
item.description: Entering Bonners Ferry on US-95 North/US-2 East. Bonners Ferry is the county seat of Boundary County, Idaho which is the northernmost county in Idaho.

item.title: US-95 North at US-2/ID-200 Interchange
item.description: US-95 North at US-2/ID-200 interchange in Ponderay. Exit here for US-2 West/ID-200/Kootenai (via ID-200)/Clark Fork (via ID-200)/Sandpoint (via US-2). Continue ahead for US-95 North/US-2 East/Bonners Ferry/Canada. This is the northern end of the Sandpoint bypass.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-2 and ID-200
item.description: US-95 North approaching US-2 and ID-200 in Ponderay. US-2 east joins US-95 north to Bonners Ferry. This is also the western end of multi-state highway 200. Highway 200 starts here as ID-200, and crosses Montana, and North Dakota before ending in Minnesota. The ID-200 shield has an inverted color scheme.

item.title: US-95 North - Sandpoint Exit
item.description: US-95 north at Sandpoint interchange. Continue north on US-95 north for US-2, Bonners Ferry, and Canada.

item.title: End US-2 West at I-5
item.description: End US-2 West at I-5 in Everett. Use I-5 north to Vancouver BC and I-5 south to Seattle. Continue straight for Everett/Hewitt Ave.

item.description: US-2 west approaching I-5 in Everett.

item.description: US-2 West/US-97 South approaching US-2/US-97 split. Use US-97 South to I-90/Ellensburg/Seattle (via Snoqualmie Pass). Use US-2 West to Leavenworth, Stevens Pass and Seattle (via Stevens Pass).

item.description: WA-28 West at WA-285 in East Wenatchee. Turn left for WA-285 North to Wenatchee. Continue west on WA-28 to US-2 and US-97. The signs directing traffic on WA-28 are an electronic sign.

item.description: WA-28 West approaching WA-285 in East Wenatchee. Turn left for WA-285. Continue straight for WA-28 to US-2 and US-97.

item.description: Entering Havre on US-2 west. Havre is the county seat of Hill County, and the 8th largest city in Montana (as of 2015). Is the largest city on the hi-line in Montana.

item.title: US-2 East/US-95 North (Cedar St.) at 5th Ave.
item.description: US-2 East/US-95 North turn left from Cedar St. onto 5th Ave.

item.title: US-2 East/US-95 North Approaching US-2/US-95
item.description: US-2 East/US-95 North (Cedar St.) at US-2 West/US-95 South (5th Ave.) to Priest River and Coeur d’Alene. US-2 East/US-95 north to Bonners Ferry and Canada.

item.title: US-2 East/US-95 North Approaching US-2/US-95
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East approaching US-95 South/US-2 West in Sandpoint. US-95 and US-2 through downtown Sandpoint are one way streets.

item.title: US-2 East/US-95 North - Sandpoint
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East on 1st Ave. north turning left onto Cedar St.

item.title: US-2 East/US-95 South at US-95
item.description: US-2 east at US-95. US-2 joins US-95 north from here to Bonners Ferry. Use US-95 south for Coeur d’Alene and Lewiston. Use US-95/US-2 North for Bonners Ferry and Canada.

item.title: US-2 East - Panhandle Historic Rivers Passage/International Selkirk Loop
item.description: US-2 east - Panhandle Historic Rivers Passage and The International Selkirk Loop.

item.title: US-2 East at ID-57
item.description: US-2 east at ID-57 north to Priest Lake.

item.title: Jct. ID-57 on US-2 East
item.description: US-2 east approaching ID-57 north.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-2 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-2 east. The Idaho welcome sign is about a half mile away from the Washington-Idaho state line.

item.title: US-2 West - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on US-2 west at ID-41 jct. Use ID-41 south for Spirit Lake and Coeur d’Alene. US-2 west for Newport and Spokane.

item.title: US-2 East - Panhandle Historic Rivers Passage
item.description: US-2 - Panhandle Historic Rivers Passage. This is the first US-2 shield in Idaho.

item.title: End ID-41 North at US-2
item.description: End ID-41 north at US-2.

item.title: US-2 East at Idaho Border - Signed As ID-41
item.description: ID-41 signage on US-2 approaching the Idaho state line. Approaching ID-41 jct., although this sign does not specify that.

item.title: US-2 East at WA-20
item.description: US-2 east at WA-20 junction. Use right lane for US-2 east to Sandpoint.

item.title: US-2 East Approaching WA-20
item.description: US-2 east approaching WA-20 west. Use right lane for US-2 east to Sandpoint.

item.title: US-2 East at WA-20/US-2 West
item.description: US-2 east approaching WA-20 west and US-2 west to Colville and Spokane. US-2 east here is a one-way street.

item.title: End WA-20 East at US-2
item.description: End WA-20 east at US-2. Use US-2 east for Sandpoint; use US-2 west for Spokane.

item.title: End ID-41 North at US-2
item.description: End ID-41north at US-2 - west to Newport/City Center; east to Priest River/Sandpoint. ID-41 is the dividing line between Washington and Idaho.

item.title: End ID-41 North at US-2
item.description: End ID-41 north at US-2. ID-41 through Oldtown is on the state line. The east side of the street is in Idaho; the west side in Washington.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 277A and 277B

item.description: US-2 east at I-90. Use right lane for I-90 West to Ritzville. Left lanes for I-90/US-2 East to Spokane.

item.description: US-2 east approaching I-90. Use right lane for I-90 west to Ritzville.

item.title: US-2 West At US-95
item.description: US-2 west at US-95. Turn right for US-95 north to Canada. Turn left for US-95 South/US-2 West to Sandpoint and Bonners Ferry.

item.title: Maple St. South in Spokane - Old US Route Marker
item.description: Shields for old routes - US-195/US-2/US-10/US-395 on Maple Street. This is interesting in a few ways. First of all, the stacking of the route numbers within the marker itself. Secondly - US-10 is decommissioned in the western US. US-195 used to end in Sandpoint, ID - following the current route of US-2 through Spokane. Currently US-195 ends a few miles to the west at I-90. Finally, there is no mention of I-90 on this sign, which is where this sign is posted at an onramp to I-90.

item.title: I-90 East Exit 277AB
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 277B - US-2 West/Spokane Airport/Fairchild AFB and Exit 277A - Garden Springs. This was taken on a snowy morning.
